languages.text: {n}Плоть взрывается фонтаном ошметков, вонючих брызг и обломков костей. Зияющая рана моментально затягивается, а вместо утраченной головы из глубин плотного комка плоти всплывает иное лицо. Тело мутанта пульсирует быстрее и интенсивнее, словно у чудовища от страха подскочил пульс. Одновременно из остальных клеток доносится многоголосый стон — боль ощутили все, кто разделил с мутантом его ужасную судьбу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Плоть взрывается фонтаном ошметков, вонючих брызг и обломков костей. Зияющая рана моментально затягивается, а вместо утраченной головы из глубин плотного комка плоти всплывает иное лицо. Тело мутанта пульсирует быстрее и интенсивнее, словно у чудовища от страха подскочил пульс. Одновременно из остальных клеток доносится многоголосый стон — боль ощутили все, кто разделил с мутантом его ужасную судьбу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The flesh explodes in a fountain of lumps, stinking spray, and bone shards. The gaping wound closes in an instant, and a different face emerges from the fleshy depths in place of the lost head. The mutant's body is pulsing faster, harder, as though the abomination's heart rate has spiked with fear. A many-voiced moan rises up from all the other cages at once — the pain was felt by all who share the mutant's horrific fate.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Плоть взрывается фонтаном ошметков, вонючих брызг и обломков костей. Зияющая рана моментально затягивается, а вместо утраченной головы из глубин плотного комка плоти всплывает иное лицо. Тело мутанта пульсирует быстрее и интенсивнее, словно у чудовища от страха подскочил пульс. Одновременно из остальных клеток доносится многоголосый стон — боль ощутили все, кто разделил с мутантом его ужасную судьбу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The flesh explodes in a fountain of lumps, stinking spray, and bone shards. Despite the gaping wound in place of the head, the mutant is still alive: its body is pulsing faster, harder, as though the abomination's heart rate has spiked with fear. A many-voiced moan rises up from all the other cages at once — the pain was felt by all who share the mutant's horrific fate.{/n}

{n}The flesh explodes in a fountain of lumps, stinking spray, and bone shards. Despite the gaping wound in place of the head, the mutant is still alive: its body is pulsing faster, harder, as though the abomination's heart rate has spiked with fear. A many-voiced moan rises up from all the other cages at once — the pain was felt by all who share the mutant's horrific fate.{/n}

Despite the gaping wound in place of the head, the mutant is still alive: its body is pulsing faster, harder, as though the abomination's heart rate has spiked with fear. A many-voiced moan rises up from all the other cages at once — the pain was felt by all who share the mutant's horrific fate.{/n}

{n}The flesh explodes in a fountain of lumps, stinking spray, and bone shards. The gaping wound closes in an instant, and a different face emerges from the fleshy depths in place of the lost head. The mutant's body is pulsing faster, harder, as though the abomination's heart rate has spiked with fear. A many-voiced moan rises up from all the other cages at once — the pain was felt by all who share the mutant's horrific fate.{/n}

languages.text: {n}肉山爆炸了，变成了一座由肿块、恶臭体液与骨头渣滓组成的喷泉。怪物头上的缺口瞬间闭合，新的脸从血肉之中浮现出来，取代了原本的头颅。怪物的身体抽搐得更快、更加剧烈，仿佛由于恐惧而心跳加速一样。由许许多多人声构成的呻吟，从所有的笼子中响了起来。所有不幸沦为变异怪物的人们，都感受到了这种痛苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flesh explodes in a fountain of lumps, stinking spray, and bone shards. The gaping wound closes in an instant, and a different face emerges from the fleshy depths in place of the lost head. The mutant's body is pulsing faster, harder, as though the abomination's heart rate has spiked with fear. A many-voiced moan rises up from all the other cages at once — the pain was felt by all who share the mutant's horrific fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}肉山爆炸了，变成了一座由肿块、恶臭体液与骨头渣滓组成的喷泉。尽管这只怪物的头部出现了一个缺口，但它依然活着，身体也抽搐得更快、更加剧烈，仿佛由于恐惧而心跳加速一样。由许许多多人声构成的呻吟，从所有的笼子中响了起来。所有不幸沦为变异怪物的人们，都感受到了这种痛苦。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La carne explota en una fuente de bultos, líquido pestilente y fragmentos óseos. La enorme herida se cierra al instante y una nueva cara aparece de las entrañas para ocupar el lugar de la cabeza perdida. El cuerpo del mutante palpita más rápido y con dificultad, como si su pulso se hubiera acelerado con el miedo. El gemido de muchas voces se alza de las demás jaulas al mismo tiempo. Parece que todos los que han sufrido el terrible destino del mutante han sentido el dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flesh explodes in a fountain of lumps, stinking spray, and bone shards. The gaping wound closes in an instant, and a different face emerges from the fleshy depths in place of the lost head. The mutant's body is pulsing faster, harder, as though the abomination's heart rate has spiked with fear. A many-voiced moan rises up from all the other cages at once — the pain was felt by all who share the mutant's horrific fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La carne explota en una fuente de bultos, líquido pestilente y fragmentos óseos. A pesar de la enorme herida que ahora sustituye a su cabeza, el mutante sigue vivo: su cuerpo palpita más rápido y con dificultad, como si su pulso se hubiera acelerado con el miedo. El gemido de muchas voces se alza de las demás jaulas al mismo tiempo. Parece que todos los que han sufrido el terrible destino del mutante han sentido el dolor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Fleisch explodiert in einer Fontäne aus Klumpen, stinkender Flüssigkeit und Knochensplittern. Die klaffende Wunde schließt sich augenblicklich, und ein anderes Gesicht taucht anstelle des verlorenen Kopfs aus den fleischigen Tiefen auf. Der Körper des Mutanten pulsiert schneller, aggressiver, als würde das Herz der Abscheulichkeit vor Angst rasen. Ein vielstimmiges Stöhnen erhebt sich aus allen anderen Käfigen gleichzeitig – der Schmerz wurde von allen empfunden, die das schreckliche Schicksal des Mutanten teilen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flesh explodes in a fountain of lumps, stinking spray, and bone shards. The gaping wound closes in an instant, and a different face emerges from the fleshy depths in place of the lost head. The mutant's body is pulsing faster, harder, as though the abomination's heart rate has spiked with fear. A many-voiced moan rises up from all the other cages at once — the pain was felt by all who share the mutant's horrific fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Fleisch explodiert in einer Fontäne aus Klumpen, stinkender Flüssigkeit und Knochensplittern. Trotz der klaffenden Wunde anstelle des Kopfes ist der Mutant noch am Leben. Sein Körper pulsiert schneller, aggressiver, als würde das Herz der Abscheulichkeit vor Angst rasen. Ein vielstimmiges Stöhnen erhebt sich aus allen anderen Käfigen gleichzeitig – der Schmerz wurde von allen empfunden, die das schreckliche Schicksal des Mutanten teilen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tête du mutant explose dans une gerbe de morceaux de chair, de liquide nauséabond et d'éclats d'os, mais la plaie béante se referme aussitôt et un visage différent émerge de l'amas de tissus sanguinolents. Son corps palpite plus vite, plus fort, comme si son rythme cardiaque s'était accéléré sous l'effet de la peur. De nombreuses voix s'élèvent simultanément de toutes les autres cages en un seul et même gémissement : tous ceux qui partagent le sort abominable du mutant ont ressenti sa douleur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flesh explodes in a fountain of lumps, stinking spray, and bone shards. The gaping wound closes in an instant, and a different face emerges from the fleshy depths in place of the lost head. The mutant's body is pulsing faster, harder, as though the abomination's heart rate has spiked with fear. A many-voiced moan rises up from all the other cages at once — the pain was felt by all who share the mutant's horrific fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tête du mutant explose dans une gerbe de morceaux de chair, de liquide nauséabond et d'éclats d'os, mais malgré cette plaie béante, il est toujours en vie : son corps palpite plus vite, plus fort, comme si son rythme cardiaque s'était accéléré sous l'effet de la peur. De nombreuses voix s'élèvent simultanément de toutes les autres cages en un seul et même gémissement : tous ceux qui partagent le sort abominable du mutant ont ressenti sa douleur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}肉体が爆発して、肉片、ひどい臭いのしぶき、骨の破片が噴水のように飛び散った。ぱっかりと開いた傷口はあっという間に塞がり、かつて頭があった場所に、肉の奥から別の顔が現れる。変異体の体はさらに速く激しく脈打ち、まるで醜いソレの心拍数が恐怖で跳ね上がったかのようだ。たくさんの主のうめき声がワッと他の全ての檻から聞こえてくる。変異体の恐ろしい運命を分かち合うすべての者達が、その痛みを感じたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flesh explodes in a fountain of lumps, stinking spray, and bone shards. The gaping wound closes in an instant, and a different face emerges from the fleshy depths in place of the lost head. The mutant's body is pulsing faster, harder, as though the abomination's heart rate has spiked with fear. A many-voiced moan rises up from all the other cages at once — the pain was felt by all who share the mutant's horrific fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}肉体が爆発して、肉片、ひどい臭いのしぶき、骨の破片が噴水のように飛び散った。ぱっかりと開いた傷口はあっという間に塞がり、かつて頭があった場所に、肉の奥から別の顔が現れる。変異体の体はさらに速く激しく脈打ち、まるで醜いソレの心拍数が恐怖で跳ね上がったかのようだ。たくさんの主のうめき声がワッと他の全ての檻から聞こえてくる。変異体の恐ろしい運命を分かち合うすべての者達が、その痛みを感じたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Etin patlamasıyla leş kokulu bir sıvı, kemik parçaları ve et öbekleri yağmaya başlıyor. Kanayan yara bir anda kapanıp infilak eden başın yerini, et yığının derinlerindeki yeni bir yüz alıyor. Mutantın vücudu, bir kalp gibi daha hızlı ve daha güçlü çarpmaya başlıyor. Âdeta garabetin nabzı, duyduğu korkudan ötürü yükseliyor. Mutantın korkunç kaderini paylaşanlar da acısını hissetmiş olmalı ki diğer kafeslerin tümünden, hep bir ağızdan bir inilti duyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flesh explodes in a fountain of lumps, stinking spray, and bone shards. The gaping wound closes in an instant, and a different face emerges from the fleshy depths in place of the lost head. The mutant's body is pulsing faster, harder, as though the abomination's heart rate has spiked with fear. A many-voiced moan rises up from all the other cages at once — the pain was felt by all who share the mutant's horrific fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Etin patlamasıyla leş kokulu bir sıvı, kemik parçaları ve et öbekleri yağmaya başlıyor. Kanayan yara bir anda kapanıp infilak eden başın yerine et yığının derinlerinden yeni bir yüz geliyor. Mutantın vücudu, bir kalp gibi daha hızlı ve daha güçlü çarpmaya başlıyor. Âdeta garabetin nabzı, duyduğu korkudan ötürü yükseliyor. Diğer kafeslerin tümünden, hep bir ağızdan bir inilti duyuluyor. Mutantın korkunç kaderini paylaşanlar da acısını hissetmiş olmalı.{/n}
